alert.note: Alert for Clermont; Hamilton; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 9:28AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL CAMPBELL, EASTERN HAMILTON, NORTHERN CLERMONT AND WARREN COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 AM EDT... At 927 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Springboro to Alexandria, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Middletown, Mason, Lebanon, Norwood, Springboro, Fort Thomas, Monroe, Blue Ash, Loveland, Franklin, Montgomery, Madeira, Alexandria, Highland Heights, Milford, Bellevue, Deer Park, Dayton and Southgate. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 6 and 42. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 39 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
